text: Ngubani na intswela bulungisa egqitha lowo uqamba ubuxoki ngoAllâh okanye ale iiVesi zaKhe?. Kwabanjalo isabelo sabo abasibekelweyo siya kubafumana sivela eNcwadini (yemimiselo), zide iziThunywa2 zeThu zifike kubo zize kuthabathaimiphefumloyabo, kezona(izithunywa) ziyakuthi: “Baphi na abo nanidla ngokubiza kubo nibanqule ngaphandle koAllâh?” Baya kuphendula bona bathi; “Banyamalele basishiya (sodwa)”. Baya kungqina ngokuchasene neziqu zabo bona, okokuba babe ngabangakholwayo
